definition[0]: a state in which you behave as if you were asleep but are still able to hear and understand what is said to you
example[0]: She went into a deep hypnotic trance.
definition[1]: a state in which you are thinking about something so much that you do not notice what is happening around you
example[1]: What’s the matter with you? You’ve been in a trance all day.
definition[2]: a type of popular electronic dance music with a fast beat and long continuous notes played on a synthesizer
